publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3456 Mr Andy Kerr: Building (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Parliament resulting from the Building (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act, and(b) any charge imposed, and any payment required to be made, by or under the Act.

S1M-3456 Mr Andy Kerr: Building (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Parliament resulting from the Building (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act, and(b) any charge imposed, and any payment required to be made, by or under the Act.

S1M-3456 Mr Andy Kerr: Building (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Parliament resulting from the Building (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act, and(b) any charge imposed, and any payment required to be made, by or under the Act.
